attributes.additional_details:
drugs are the main cause of misery in the world to-day
ie. fund the taliban,initiate crime,fund prostitution.
the reason is the high value of drugs
my solution is to reduce the value of drugs by governments supplying them free to addicts
this will result in acollapse of the drug trade
of course at the same time govts. will set up rehabilitation for addicts
think about it!
no more wars no more terrorists no more crime no more misery
